titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Switzerland
Switzerland

div.head: Legislation
div.p: According to a freedom of information law from 2006, unless there are overriding public or private interests that would speak against such a disclosure, everyone now has right of access to official documents in public administration. All documents created after 1 July 2006 can be viewed. For documents created before this date, materials older than 30 years are available for viewing at the National Archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: Department of Foreign Affairs Postal Address: Eidgenössisches Departement für auswärtige Angelegenheiten (EDA) Generalsekretariat Öffentlichkeitsprinzip CH-3003
Bern Swiss Federal Archives, Archivstrasse 24, CH-3003 Bern

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Requests for access to documents created after 1 July 2006 should be sent to the Department of Foreign Affairs. For earlier materials, members of the public should contact the National Archives.
